segments.text: David , why don't you clean your room ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am not in the mood .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I was told my girlfriend was speaking ill of me . It's a real letdown .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't think she would do such a thing .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But she did and it made me disappointed .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , cheer up ! A girlfriend is not everything .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But she means a lot to me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , I just can't forget it .
segments.speaker: S2
